problem.markdown:
>>Which of the following are NOT primitives in thermodynamics?(Select one or more)<< [x] Entropy [ ] Volume [x] Enthalpy [ ] Electric Current [ ] Work
[explanation] Volume is defined in geometry, and electric current and work are defined in other branches of physics. [explanation]
problem.p: Which of the following are NOT primitives in thermodynamics?(Select one or more)

checkboxgroup.label: Which of the following are NOT primitives in thermodynamics?(Select one or more)

div.p: Volume is defined in geometry, and electric current and work are defined in other branches of physics.
